name: inde
description: - [x] Sync vs Async Review (Demo)     - async.js - [x] High Order Functions & Callback Review (Demo)     - callback.js     - not all functions with callbacks are async (foreach, map ...)     - but all async functions use callbacks, or return a function is async - [] Hal Example (Video)     - userInterface callback explanation     - userInterface promises explanation - [] Introduction to Promises     - promise.js     - add setTimeout - [] promise-all     - promise-all.js - [] promise-race     - promise-race.js - [] promise-read-file     - readFlile.js
